Volunteering

Roots of Hope

WWF Pakistan | Volunteer Coordinator Summer 2024

Organized a large-scale plantation drive at an orphanage and surrounding communities in Rawalpindi and Mansehra. Led a team of youth volunteers to plant and sustain native trees, promoting environmental awareness among children and staff.

  • Planted 130+ trees including Mulberry, Java Plum, Acacia, Farkle Berry, Chir Pine, Eucalyptus, Peach, and Apricot.
  • Collaborated with WWF, school management, private site owners, and local donors
  • Managed follow-up visits and post-plantation care

Voter Awareness Campaign

C2C Foundation | Election Commission of Pakistan February 2024

Collaborated with the Chiragh-2-Chiragh Foundation for targeted awareness campaigns on voting rights.

  • Educated young adults and marginalized communities, including transgender individuals and the visually impaired
  • Managed logistics from school outreach to coordinating speaking engagements
Download Certificate

Ramadan Ration Distribution

Organizer | Food Support Initiative Ramadan 2023

Contributed to relief efforts during difficult times by distributing ration packages to low-income families during Ramadan. Funded in collaboration with friends and well-wishers.

  • Packaged and delivered essential items to dozens of families
  • Prioritized widows, daily-wage workers, and the elderly
  • Maintained transparency and dignity during distribution
